test.create_query: create table ht_prefetch (a String, b String, c UInt64) engine=Memory
test.fill_query: insert into ht_prefetch select concat('key', toString(number)), concat('value', toString(rand())), rand() % 1000 from numbers(1e7)
test.query: select a, b , avg(c) from ht_prefetch group by a, b format Null
